name: Update a book
description:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
  as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.
descriptionHtml:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
And I have some unique data of a book
Given a book exists in the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1745933772, title=Clouds of Witness, description=Enim repellendus est nihil ut et iure nam., pageCount=335, excerpt=Accusamus sed quas at voluptate omnis qui. Velit soluta ipsam. Nisi eius odit dolores ducimus fuga ut autem. In qui magni eius laboriosam velit. Qui sapiente qui repellendus., publishDate=2025-09-20T16:59:17.834791830Z]

steps.name: When I change selected information of that book

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1745933772, title=Clouds of Witness (2nd ed.), description=Enim repellendus est nihil ut et iure nam., pageCount=336, excerpt=Accusamus sed quas at voluptate omnis qui. Velit soluta ipsam. Nisi eius odit dolores ducimus fuga ut autem. In qui magni eius laboriosam velit. Qui sapiente qui repellendus., publishDate=2025-09-20T16:59:17.834791830Z]

steps.name: Then the updated information about the book is visible to users
